thread.section_title: Hotel La Parizienne by Elegancia - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Stay
thread.title_full: Lovely Stay - Review of Hotel La Parizienne by Elegancia, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: shankel35
title: Lovely Stay
text: Stayed here recently for a 4 day break in Paris. Lovely boutique hotel in a nice part of the city. Staff extremely friendly & helpful. Room was warm & comfortable. Breakfast was lovely and plentiful and the staff were on the ball for any refills. Would definitely stay here again when visiting Paris as it offers a great location & good value for money.
